title: Frank Lloyd Wright April Showers II Blue Earrings
description:
Frank Lloyd Wright submitted “April Showers” to Liberty Magazine. It was considered too avant-garde and rejected. In this design, Wright’s masterful use of the tools of his trade: a t-square, triangle, compass, colored pencils, created enduring art that captures the essence of spring.

Frank Lloyd Wright submitted “April Showers” to Liberty Magazine. It was considered too avant-garde and rejected. In this design, Wright’s masterful use of the tools of his trade: a t-square, triangle, compass, and colored pencils, created enduring art that captures the essence of spring.

Details:


• Solid brass,
• Electro-plated with non-tarnishing silver finish
• Glass beads
• Ear wires are hypo-allergenic
• Hangs approx. 1.50"
